interactions.Alarm:

Over time, the user has requested the ability to set recurring alarms specifically for weekdays, as his schedule tends to be more flexible on weekends. He appreciates the convenience of not having to manually set the alarm every night before going to bed.

In addition to setting alarms, the user has occasionally asked for recommendations on developing a consistent sleep routine to improve his overall well-being during his job search. The assistant has provided tips on establishing a bedtime routine, creating a sleep-friendly environment, and practicing relaxation techniques.

The user's interactions with the assistant have been polite and straightforward, reflecting his direct communication style. He values efficiency and has expressed appreciation for the assistant's ability to quickly set or modify alarms based on his preferences without unnecessary prompts or confirmations.

As his job search progresses, the user may request additional alarm customization options, such as the ability to set temporary alarms for specific dates or the option to snooze the alarm for a predetermined duration.
